'''Mora Chests''' (''unofficial name''), also known as '''Rock Piles''' or '''Smashed Stones''', are small piles of rock that contain [[Mora]]. When [[Investigation|investigated]], they will randomly yield 10,000, 15,000, or 20,000 [[Mora]].

Mora Chests are found in [[Enkanomiya]], [[The Chasm]] and [[Sumeru]].

For specific locations, see the Official Interactive Map:
* [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=359 Teyvat]
* [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/7?shown_types=329 Enkanomiya]
